attributes.action: Stand firm and tell the world that we are still primarily a Christian country
attributes.additional_details:
Multi cultural with no direction
A country needs leadership and direction 
A leadership of honesty and dedication to help and serve others.
Isis and the world situation is a result of hatred and evil
attributes.background: Dont lose sight of the blessing god has given us as a christian nation. Get our focus back to God, where we used to be that has good values within a country of faith, hope and love, not war and evil.
